gameConfigDialog - Class in Vue
The class gameConfigDialog is a class who will be created by a instance of welcomeFrame.
gameConfigDialog(JFrame) - Constructor for class Vue.gameConfigDialog
The constructor for gameConfigDialog.It will create a window of dialogue with title and call the function initialize;
GameController - Class in controller
The class GameController is the core of our projet, it is a controller who ensures all the smooth operations of the game.
